title: Copy file path shortcut
description: Press 'y' to copy current file's path to clipboard via xclip/xsel. Show notification. TDD: test clipboard command is invoked with correct path.

title: Side-by-side diff view
description: Alternative diff rendering mode showing old and new content in parallel columns. Auto-disable on narrow terminals (<140 cols). Toggle with keyboard shortcut.

title: Visual line mode and yank to editor
description: Add V for visual line mode: tracks anchor+cursor range, y yanks selection as fenced code block via pasteToEditor(). Single y (no visual) yanks filepath:linenum. Esc cancels visual mode. Remove side-by-side view toggle and v keybind. Update index.ts render to highlight cursor line (and visual selection range). TDD.

title: Extract pi-diff-ui shared package
description: Extract core diff rendering logic from diff-review into a standalone pi-diff-ui package. This enables orchestrator (and future extensions) to reuse the same diff modal UI with different data sources (git worktrees, arbitrary files, etc).

title: Basic inline diff renderer
description: Render unified diff lines with appropriate colors (green for added, red for removed, dim for context). Line numbers. Use theme colors (toolDiffAdded, toolDiffRemoved, toolDiffContext). TDD: test render output for known diffs.

title: Scroll support for large diffs
description: Keyboard scrolling (j/k or arrows) through diffs that exceed terminal height. Track scroll position, render visible window. TDD: test scroll bounds, render at various offsets.

title: Pi Diff Review Extension
description: Modal overlay for reviewing file diffs with syntax highlighting, inline/side-by-side views, keyboard navigation.

title: Diff capture engine
description: Intercept write/edit tool_result events. Capture original file content before first modification. Compute unified diffs. Store in-memory state map (filepath â†’ {original, diffs}).

title: Modal overlay with file list
description: Overlay modal opened/closed with Ctrl+R. File list on left/top, diff view on right/main. Navigate between files. Dismiss files. Copy file path.

title: Overlay modal shell
description: Create overlay component via ctx.ui.custom with overlay:true. Open/close with Ctrl+R via registerShortcut. Basic chrome (border, title). TDD: test modal opens/closes, shortcut registration.

title: Changed files status widget
description: Show a persistent status indicator (e.g. 'ðŸ“‹ 3 files changed') when the modal is closed. Update count as files are modified/dismissed.

title: Files inside .openclaw not tracked by diff review
description: The extension hooks tool_call/tool_result for write/edit tools, but changes to files inside ~/.openclaw (or .openclaw/) are not being picked up in the diff review modal. Investigate whether the path resolution, pre-capture, or tracking logic is filtering these out. Could be a hidden directory issue, a path normalization issue, or the tools reporting paths differently for dotfiles. Reproduce, write a failing test, then fix.

title: Replace review_agent renderResult with diff overlay
description: In orchestrator, review_agent's execute() reads file contents from both sides of the worktree branch (git show main:path vs git show branch:path for each changed file), loads them into a pi-diff-ui DiffState, and opens the diff overlay via openDiffOverlay(). Remove the old renderResult plain-text display. Add pi-diff-ui as file: dependency. TDD.

title: Widget with file summary
description: Optional widget above editor showing brief file list. Update dynamically. TDD: test widget content matches state.

title: View mode toggle and width detection
description: Toggle between inline and side-by-side with a keyboard shortcut (Tab). Auto-fallback to inline when terminal width < 120 cols. TDD: test mode switching, width threshold behavior.

title: File list navigation
description: Show list of changed files. Navigate with up/down arrows. Show file path and change summary (+N/-N lines). Current selection highlighted. TDD: test navigation wrapping, selection state.

title: File snapshot capture on tool_result
description: Hook tool_result for write and edit tools. On first modification of a file, read original content. Store original snapshot. On subsequent modifications, update current content. TDD: test that snapshots are captured correctly, that repeated edits accumulate.

title: Status line with file count
description: Use ctx.ui.setStatus to show changed file count. Update on every tool_result and dismiss. Clear when no files pending. TDD: test count updates correctly.

title: Dismiss file shortcut
description: Press 'd' to dismiss current file (reset snapshot to current, remove from list). TDD: test dismiss removes from list, resets baseline.

title: Syntax highlighting in diff view
description: Apply syntax highlighting to diff content using Pi's highlightCode() and getLanguageFromPath(). Highlight the code portions while preserving diff coloring for +/- indicators. TDD: test highlighting is applied based on file extension.

title: Inline diff view component
description: TUI component that renders a unified diff with syntax highlighting. Line numbers, +/- markers, color-coded additions/deletions. Scrollable for large diffs.

title: Remove dead code from diff-review
description: Delete side-by-side-view.ts, clipboard.ts, and their tests from diff-review. These are unused after the extraction. Also remove version.ts if not referenced.

title: Dismiss and snapshot reset
description: When a file is dismissed, update the original snapshot to current content so future edits diff against the reviewed state. TDD: test dismiss resets baseline, subsequent edits produce correct diffs.

title: Add cursor tracking to inline diff view
description: Add a cursorLine property to InlineDiffView that tracks which rendered line the cursor is on. j/k/arrows move it, Ctrl+D/U move it by half-page. Auto-scrolls when cursor moves past visible bounds. Expose cursorLine, getCursorDiffLine() (returns the DiffLine at cursor), and moveCursor(delta). TDD.

title: Rewire diff-review as thin extension wrapper
description: Replace diff-review's local modules with imports from pi-diff-ui (file: dependency). Keep only: index.ts (extension wiring, tool_call/tool_result hooks, Ctrl+Shift+R binding, pre-capture logic), path-utils.ts, status.ts, and their tests. The overlay rendering in index.ts gets replaced with a call to openDiffOverlay() from pi-diff-ui. All remaining tests pass. Extension behavior unchanged.

title: Side-by-side diff renderer
description: Split terminal width in half. Left = old content, right = new content. Aligned by diff hunks. Syntax highlighted. TDD: test column layout, alignment, width calculations.

title: Unified diff computation
description: Given original and current content, compute a unified diff. Handle new files (no original). Handle deleted content. TDD: test various diff scenarios - additions, deletions, modifications, new files.

title: Full-screen diff UI with header bar
Scaffold pi-diff-ui package repo
description: Create ~/repos/pi-diff-ui with package.json, tsconfig, vitest config. Move these modules from diff-review: diff-engine, diff-state, inline-view, diff-view-controller, modal, types, constants. Move corresponding tests. Add an openDiffOverlay() function that encapsulates the ctx.ui.custom() overlay logic from diff-review's index.ts. Export everything from index.ts. All 185 existing tests should pass in the new location (minus path-utils and status tests which stay).
